title: Google\Cloud\VideoIntelligence\V1\SpeechTranscription
name: SpeechTranscription
description:
A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.videointelligence.v1.SpeechTranscription

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.alternatives
params.description: May contain one or more recognition hypotheses (up to the maximum specified in max_alternatives). These alternatives are ordered in terms of accuracy, with the top (first) alternative being the most probable, as ranked by the recognizer.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Output only. The BCP-47 language tag of the language in this result. This language code was detected to have the most likelihood of being spoken in the audio.
